title: Members & Contact
text:
Our team consists of experienced healthcare professionals who have a passion for innovation and improving patient outcomes. We believe that our technology has the potential to revolutionize the way lung cancer is diagnosed and treated. Our mission is to provide healthcare providers and patients with an accessible, accurate, and affordable solution for early lung cancer detection. We are committed to ongoing research and development, ensuring that our product remains at the forefront of medical technology.



Our values include a commitment to patient-centered care, excellence, and innovation. We believe that every patient deserves access to the best healthcare possible, and we are dedicated to providing that. We are proud to be leading the way in early lung cancer detection, and we are excited to see the impact that our product can have on patients’ lives.






We are always happy to hear from readers, patients, healthcare providers, and researchers. If you have any questions or comments about our product, research, or blog, please don’t hesitate to contact us. You can reach us by email or by using the contact form on our website. We are committed to responding to all inquiries promptly and are always happy to provide more information about our product and research.
We value feedback from our readers and are always looking for ways to improve our product and blog. If you have any suggestions or feedback on how we can improve, please don’t hesitate to let us know. We are committed to providing the best possible service to our readers, patients, healthcare providers, and researchers, and your feedback is invaluable in helping us achieve this goal.
In conclusion, our website is designed to provide information and resources for anyone interested in early lung cancer detection. We believe that our product has the potential to save countless lives, and we are committed to ensuring that it is accessible to all who need it. We are dedicated to ongoing research and development, and we believe that our blog is an essential part of our mission to educate and inform. Thank you for visiting our website, and we look forward to hearing from you.

title: Healthyus
text:
Our blog is an essential part of our website, providing readers with the latest news and updates on lung cancer detection and treatment. We are committed to educating patients, healthcare providers, and researchers about early lung cancer detection and its importance in improving patient outcomes. Our blog covers a wide range of topics, including the latest research updates, patient stories, and information on upcoming events and conferences.
We are passionate about sharing knowledge and information that can improve the lives of patients and their families. We believe that education is key to improving health outcomes, and our blog is an excellent resource for anyone who wants to learn more about lung cancer detection and treatment. Our blog is updated regularly, ensuring that readers always have access to the latest information.
Our blog is written by healthcare professionals and researchers with expertise in lung cancer detection and treatment. We are committed to providing accurate and up-to-date information, ensuring that our readers can make informed decisions about their health. Our blog is an excellent resource for patients and their families, healthcare providers, and researchers looking to stay up-to-date with the latest developments in lung cancer detection and treatment.

title: Healthyus
text:
Beyond X-Ray
Welcome to our healthyus startup dedicated to early lung cancer detection through VOCs data, sensor array, and AI algorithms. We have developed a product that uses cutting-edge technology to identify the presence of lung cancer with high accuracy. Our Volatile Organic Compound (VoC) and AI algorithm-based product is non-invasive, painless, and affordable, making it accessible to everyone. We believe that early detection is key to improving patients’ chances of survival, and we are committed to making this technology available to all.

title: Product & Service
text:
Our lung cancer detection product uses VoC and AI algorithms to analyze a patient’s breath sample. Our technology is highly accurate, with clinical trials demonstrating a success rate of over 95%. The process is quick and non-invasive, providing patients with a painless and affordable option for lung cancer detection. Our product is designed to be accessible to all, and we believe that it has the potential to save countless lives.
Our VoC technology identifies specific biomarkers that are present in the breath, providing an accurate diagnosis of the presence of lung cancer. Our AI algorithms process the data, providing a quick and accurate diagnosis. Our product is designed to be easy to use, enabling healthcare providers to provide a quick and accurate diagnosis to patients without the need for invasive procedures.






Our product uses VoC technology to identify specific biomarkers in a patient’s breath sample. The technology is highly sensitive and can detect minute changes in the breath that may be indicative of the presence of cancer. Our AI algorithms then process the data, providing a diagnosis with high accuracy. The entire process is non-invasive, quick, and painless, providing patients with an accessible and affordable option for early lung cancer detection.
Our product is designed to be used by healthcare providers in a clinical setting. Healthcare providers can take a breath sample from a patient using our technology, and the results are available within minutes. Our product is designed to be easy to use, making it accessible to all healthcare providers, regardless of their level of experience.

title: Product & Service
Research & Development
text:
Our product has undergone extensive research, including clinical trials that demonstrate an accuracy rate of over 95%. Our product has been recognized by leading medical institutions and researchers, and we are committed to ongoing research and development to ensure that our product remains at the forefront of medical technology. We believe that our product has the potential to save countless lives, and we are excited to continue our research to improve its accuracy and effectiveness.
Healthyus has an ETRI-research institute partnership where the Electronics and Telecommunications Research Institute (ETRI) is a Korean government-funded research institution in Korea. ETRI has invested exhaled breath-based E-nose technology for mobile healthcare and developed biomarkers-based healthcare devices. Seoul National University Bundang Hospital (SNUH) conducted clinical trials on lung cancer patients.
ETRI, which is our partner, has been published in leading medical journals, and ETRI has presented its findings at conferences around the world. We are committed to transparency in our research and are always happy to share our findings with other researchers and healthcare providers.
